main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Hawthorn, California, with observers describing it as a round bright object moving in the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as being 15 feet in diameter with an orange tint,Several witnesses reported seeing the object,The object moved from north to west and was seen directly above the observer,Visibility conditions were noted as clear with visibility up to 10 miles,Surveillance was maintained on the area with no unusual radar observations.
witness description: Civilian control tower operators and additional unidentified personnel
